content.text: Lean back and let the music guide you, as you embark on an imaginary journey.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.text:
Well done.

Music can help our brains to evoke emotions and images, less affected by our regular ways of thinking.

en.name: PsyPal At dawn - music only

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

en.description: Let the music accompany you on a journey without guidance.

content.text:
Embarque na sua própria viagem, guiado apenas pela música.

O objetivo é praticar um estado alterado de consciência.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.text:
Bem-vindo de volta e bom trabalho.

Imergir na música pode ajudar os nossos cérebros a descansar e a reiniciar. Pode trazer-nos novos pensamentos, assim como oferecer um intervalo do ruído quotidiano.

pt-PT.name: Ao amanhecer – só música

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

pt-PT.description: Técnicas de *mindfulness* e imagética com recurso a música podem ajudar os nossos cérebros a praticar estados de consciência alterados.

hostNotes.text:
Welcome. I am X and today we will work for around 30 minutes on xx

We’ll be doing xx ex. meditation followed by time for reflection and sharing with each other.

Let’s start with a mini check-in. How are you feeling right now? Please answer in two-three words. X, would you like to start?

> Let everyone in the session, including yourself, check in one by one.

Thank you all for checking in. Let’s get started.

Find a comfortable position. I will start the audio exercise and we'll meet back here afterwards. 

> Push play to start the audio exercise

Now we’ll take 1 minute to reflect on our own.

xxMain question

xxFurther explanations of main question if needed

You can take notes on a piece of paper or just mental notes in your head. And there is no right or wrong here, our answers are our own. 1 minute starting now.

> Press play to start the timer.

That’s 1 minute and it’s time to move on.

Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

Well done. If you’re up for it, you can continue what we started here today with a mission to bring this into your everyday life.

xx mission description

Before we leave this space let’s do a mini check-out. 

How are you feeling right now? Has anything shifted? Please answer in two-three words.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone in the session check out one by one.

Thank you all for checking out and for joining this session today.

> Finish session to send everyone off to the exit experience.

content.text:
Well done.

Summary.

If you’re up for it, you can continue with this mission.

mission description

content.text:
Begive dig ud på din egen rejse, kun guidet af musikken.

Hensigten med dette er at øve det at være i en ændret bevidsthedstilstand.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.text:
Velkommen tilbage, og godt klaret. 

At fordybe sig i musik kan hjælpe os  med at slappe af og give slip. Det kan give plads til nye tanker og kan give os en pause fra hverdagens larm.

da.name: Ved daggry - kun musik

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

da.description: Musik kan hjælpe os til at træde ind i en let ændret bevidsthedstilstand, samt slappe af, genstarte, og komme i kontakt med kroppen.

content.text:
Vydáte na vlastní cestu jen s hudbou.

Záměrem je učit se prožívat změněný stav vědomí.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

There will be a timer set for 2 minutes as an indicator. If you don’t want to share you can always say ‘pass’.

Who would like to start?

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.text:
Vítejte zpět. Dobrá práce.

Ponoření se do poslechu hudby může pomoci naší mysli odpočinout si a nabrat nové síly. Může přinést nové myšlenky a také nám poskytnout přestávku od každodenního shonu.

cs.name: Za úsvitu – pouze hudba

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

cs.description: Vydejte se na cestu, vedeni pouze hudbou. Hudba nám může pomoci cvičit změněné stavy vědomí.

content.text:
En ten slotte je eigen reis te beginnen, alleen begeleid door de muziek.

Het doel is om te oefenen in het ervaren van een veranderde bewustzijnstoestand.

hostNotes.text:
Now we are getting into the sharing part. We have three rules for sharing:

1. **What is said in here, stays in here.**
2. **All you need to do is listen.** There is no fixing, helping or advice-giving needed. We are just showing up and exploring what ourselves and others are going through.

3. **Everything on the inside is okay.** Anger, love, hatred, sadness. Whatever shows up. No wrongs, no rights. It is what it is.

> Let everyone (or as many as you got time for) share one by one. Press play to start the timer. Re-start for each new sharing.

Thank you so much everyone.

content.text:
Welkom terug, en goed gedaan.

Jezelf onderdompelen in muziek kan onze hersenen helpen rusten en enigszins resetten. Het kan nieuwe gedachten brengen en ons een pauze geven van de dagelijkse drukte.

nl.name: Bij het ochtendgloren - alleen muziek

hostNotes.text: > Start the session when you're ready to go

nl.description: Muziek kunnen onze hersenen helpen oefenen in het ervaren van veranderde bewustzijnstoestanden. Het kan een manier zijn om te ontspannen, te resetten en onszelf te aarden in ons lichaam.

pt-BR.description: Deixe a música te guiar por um caminho tranquilo, sem pressa ou destino certo.

hostNotes.text: >Comece a sessão quando estiver pronto para seguir

pt-BR.name: PsyPal Ao amanhecer – apenas música

content.text: Recoste-se e deixe a música te guiar enquanto você embarca em uma jornada imaginária.

hostNotes.text:
Agora estamos entrando na parte de compartilhamento. Temos três regras para o compartilhamento:

1. **O que é dito aqui, fica aqui.**
2. **Tudo o que você precisa fazer é ouvir.** Não é necessário consertar, ajudar ou dar conselhos. Estamos apenas presentes e explorando o que nós e os outros estamos vivenciando.

3. **Tudo o que você sentir é válido.** Raiva, amor, ódio, tristeza. O que surgir. Não existe certo ou errado. 

O cronômetro será ajustado para 2 minutos como referência. Se você não quiser compartilhar, pode simplesmente dizer “passo”.

Quem gostaria de começar?

> Deixe todos (ou o maior número possível, conforme o tempo permitir) compartilharem um por um. Aperte play para iniciar o cronômetro. Reinicie para cada novo compartilhamento.

Muito obrigado a todos.

content.text:
Muito bem.

A música pode ajudar nosso cérebro a evocar emoções e imagens, menos influenciadas pelos nossos modos habituais de pensar.
